00013 SubstractingSnapshotPreprocessor::SubstractingSnapshotPreprocessor(
00014     const Teuchos::RCP<const Epetra_Vector> &origin_in) :
00015   modifiedSnapshots_(),
00016   origin_(origin_in)

00031 void
00032 SubstractingSnapshotPreprocessor::rawSnapshotSetIs(const Teuchos::RCP<Epetra_MultiVector> &rs)
00033 {
00034   if (Teuchos::nonnull(rs) && Teuchos::nonnull(origin_)) {
00035     const int vecCount = rs->NumVectors();
00036     for (int iVec = 0; iVec < vecCount; ++iVec) {
00037       (*rs)(iVec)->Update(-1.0, *origin_, 1.0);
00038     }
00039   }
00040   modifiedSnapshots_ = rs;
00041 }
00042 
00043 } // namespace MOR
